states.start: 👋 Hi, welcome to anonymous chat bot in English!

menu.general:
📕 You're in the main menu now

👉 To start chatting, press the button bellow

chat.found:
👑 We're found company for you!

/newchat — to start new chat
/stopchat — to stop this chat
chat.finish:
🔚 Your chat is ended. Hope you enjoyed this session!

🧑‍💻 Write @uw935 if you want to report this user
chat.finish_by_companion:
😞 Your chat is stopped by the companion

🧑‍💻 Write @uw935 if you want to report this user
chat.still_searching: 🔍 We still try to find new company for you, please wait...
chat.type_error:
🚷 You can't send this type of message

❌ Message wasn't delivered.
chat.wait_too_long:
⏳ It's getting a little long to find the new company for you...

But we still trying...
